data.name: Dominance
data.detailed_description:
Dominance is a multiplayer battle royale shooter. Set in a post apocalyptic world of the late 80s, the game keeps its players in permanent suspense. It’s easy to immerse yourself into the City’s mysteries, but damn hard to become a Dominator! Choose any of 8 various characters — and become one of the Seekers in the City. From now you're into a fight with other survivals, aiming to find a powerful artifact left on our Earth by enigmatic Guests...

The game has MOBA elements alongside with top down shooter mechanics:: all the characters have different skills and abilities, so think twice if your character suits your tactics and playstyle — and choose wisely. Also you can upgrade the Seeker right during the battle - such a space for showing off your power!

The dangerous City lies before you — would you dare meeting it face to face?

Dominance has:
  • tight and easy to learn controls
  • short sessions to master the game faster
  • dynamic gameplay with lots of room for strategy
  • 8+ characters with unique active skills and passive masteries
  • MOBA elements: build and upgrade your character right during the fight!
  • Weapon variety. Wall penetrating energy weapons, ricochet sniper rifles, kalashnikovs, hockey sticks...
  • fog of war, that hides not only you, but your enemies as well: put your mind to the soundwaves.

data.short_description: Dominance is a multiplayer top-down hero based shooter, set in a post-apocalyptic alternative history world of the late 80s. The game offers you a dynamic battle royale experience, filled with tactics, ballistics and stealth.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1,Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, AMD FX™-6300, or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM, or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770, AMD FX™-9590, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 6GB VRAM, AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 8GB VRAM, or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
